ComicInfo.Summary:
Meet the Juice Squeezers: a group of elementary-school kids tasked with secretly keeping their small town safe from a horrible, underground epidemic—written and drawn by David Lapham! Learn about a vampire couple during the time of the Black Plague in Steve Niles and menton3’s The Nosferatu Wars! Join bounty hunter Mercy St. Clair on a vacation gone horribly wrong in Ron Randall’s Trekker!
Plus, new installments of Buffy, Blackout, Nexus, Crime Does Not Pay, Underground, Alabaster: Boxcar Tales, and Bloodhound!
David Lapham writes and draws a gory all-ages story.
Story & Chapter TitlesTrekker: The Train to Avalon Bay - Chapter 3Nosferatu Wars - Chapter 1Underground - Chapter 2Squish: A Juice Squeezer's Tale - "The First Rule of Basket-Weaving Club" - Chapter 1Nexus: Into the Past - Chapter 4Steggy Wilmot and Spimps - Chapter 1Crime Does Not Pay presents: City of Roses - Chapter 7Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Love vs. Life - Chapter 2Alabaster: Boxcar Tales - Chapter 7Blackout: Strange Terrain - Chapter 3Brain Bot Jr. - Chapter 1
